p: After 8 days of incubation, 10 µL of resazurin (alamarBlue; Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA) solution was added to each well, incubated 48 h at 35 °C, and assessed for color development. A change from blue to pink indicates reduction of resazurin to resorfurin and proofs bacterial viability. The MIC was defined as the lowest drug concentration that prevented this color change [ 41]. The assay was performed in triplicate.
